product.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Roller Blind
product.description: The pale purple gibson lilac mist is ideal for lighter rooms, or for pairing with light purple or blue furniture. Match this in with your bathroom towels to create a coherent colour in the bathroom. Being 100% waterproof makes this blind perfect for installing in your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Valencia Touchstone Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space. The pebbly grey fabric is chic and fashionable, but has an earthy tone that lends a little more cosiness. Its a hardwearing fabric too, easy to c sleek, straightforward and stylish, this valencia touchstone grey roller blind is perfect for adding warmth to a contemporary space.

relproducts.title: Gibson Perfect White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The gibson perfect white is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the blind's hardwearing fabric is wipe-clean and fire retardant, so it can work in tricky spaces such as bathrooms and kitchens. Choose to have controls on either the left or right according to what best suits your layout.

relproducts.title: Gibson Persian Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich, teal blue coloured gibson persian blue would work brilliantly against a neutral background to help highlight the colour in this blind. This is a beautiful colour and great for anyone looking for a teal roller blind. Use this blind to lift and enhance a room - especially a bathroom as this 100% waterproof fabric can withstand anything thrown at it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Sky Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The light, sky blue colour is airy and gentle. Pair this with lighter decors or with rooms that have a blue theme to them. Additionally, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant. This roller blind is very versatile and can be installed in kitchens, bathrooms, living rooms and bedrooms - brilliant. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Navy Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The dark gibson navy is the darkest blue colour in the range. Bordering on a purple colour, this fabric is great for anyone looking for a deep blue coloured roller blind. The durability of this blind means that it can be installed in bathrooms without fear of water damaging it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Sapphire Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The lighter blue in the gibson sapphire is rich and bright. This is a great sky blue colour and is perfect for bathrooms or matching in with blue decors. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of colour. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson White Dove Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The gibson white dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathroom. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it ideal for placing in a hot, steamy bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Azure Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The royal tone in the gibson azure is a more refined, deeper colour. This is great for rooms that already have blue in them or need some darker colours added in. This is a very durable fabric that can be used in kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms. The gibson range is full of bright and bold colours. The fabric is very versatile, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant.

relproducts.title: Gibson Granny Smith Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The gibson granny smith is a lighter green colour, with hints of yellow to it. This lime green roller blind is great for making a statement in a room or drawing attention to the window. This will match in with yellow or green-focused decors and can also be used in bathrooms because of its moisture resistant properties. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Crimson Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Our range of dimout fabrics are perfect for gently filtering the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy without blocking too much of the light from getting in. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Fresh and fruity, this valencia spring green roller blind will give your home a bright burst of colour. Combine this blind with more earthy tones to give your room a bold and funky accent or use it to create a vibrant and vivid interior with other striking colours.

relproducts.title: Valencia Sangria Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour. Clearly this blind has a vibrant tone but its also a sophisticated choice that will add richness to a scheme. This juicy colour will be a wonderful accent to a room of soft browns and neutral or maybe lighter whites or the valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour.

relproducts.title: Valencia Orange Embers Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Choose their striking orange roller blind to add a stunning splash of colour. Its as bright as bright can be. This blind will add a funky zing to any interior; think family rooms, breakfast rooms, rooms featuring strong blocks of colour as well as childrens bedrooms.

relproducts.title: Gibson Powder Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The light gibson powder grey is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor. The lighter grey will help enhance and lift the room. Use this in any room in your home as it is fire retardant and 100% moisture resistant - ideal for bathrooms. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Pewter Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The gibson pewter is a dark grey coloured roller blind, pair this against lighter decors to make a statement in the room. The dark colour pairs well with darker decors too, but throw something light in there to keep the mood up. This blind looks brilliant in a bathroom, and being 100% waterproof makes it the perfect addition to your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

relproducts.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Vertical
relproducts.description: The pale, lilac mist colour is best used in a room where you want the blind to blend in with the rest of the room. Use this with similar pastel tones. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

relproducts.title: Gibson Powder Grey Vertical
relproducts.description: The lighter grey tone in the gibson powder grey is perfect for use in bathrooms or bedrooms. The vertical slats tilt so you have total control over the light entering your room. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
